Details: Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.
Companion gets a weapon of their own. Uses Expertise and Presence for the attacks instead.
After you spend AP to make an attack, may pay 2 essence to make an attack from other half.
After you hit a creature with an attack, you may shift once. Resolves before Unison attack.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.
If Unison attacks are from different range categories, gain advantage on second attack.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.
Start of turn, can choose companion, host or neither. Chosen has advantage on all attacks, other has disadvantage.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.
